name: Dimensional inconsistency
description:
The main character gets pulled in through the portal to another dimension. Longing for his home he is travelling through different dimensions to find a way out. Finally after some struggles he manages to get back to his home dimension where nothing poses a threat - but is it really something he wanted all along?

CONTROLS:

Arrows - move sideways / choose direction of dash
Z - jump
C - ghost dash (press once to send ghost, press second time to teleport to ghost)

CREDITS:
